attributes.action: Grant an extra bank holiday on Aneurin Bevan’s birthday, To honour the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament To debate granting the Country an additional Bank Holiday on 15th November as a lasting tribute to NHS and Care workers who protected us throughout the Coronavirus pandemic.
The UK has only 8 bank holidays a year far fewer than any other European Country. There have been many calls by MP’s to increase the Uk allocation. Now is the time to grant one extra day as NHS day, to show we all care for our UK workers. We cared for us in 2020
attributes.background:
Following the Coronavirus pandemic we should honour all health & care workers in the Uk.
On Aneurin Bevin’s, the father of the NHS,  birthdate, 15th November, a NHS appreciation  bank holiday should be granted to UK citizens so we will never forget what the NHS did for us all in 2020.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
